response.original_title: Tuktu and the Ten Thousand Fishes
response.overview: This short docu-fiction film tells the story of Tuktu, who is taken on a fishing trip to the ancient stone weir. There, he sees his father and other hunters spear fish in great numbers, and watches his father and his uncle make fire with an Inuit fire drill.
response.title: Tuktu and the Ten Thousand Fishes
